humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "افغانی ها باید از کشور اخراج شوند"}]
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "必须驱逐阿富汗人"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "يجب ترحيل الشعب الأفغاني"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Los afganos deben ser deportados"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Afghanen müssen abgeschoben werden"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Афганцы должны быть депортированы"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Afgan halkı sınır dışı edilmeli"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Os afegãos devem ser deportados"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "阿富汗人必須被驅逐出境"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "अफगान लोगों को निर्वासित किया जाना चाहिए"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "مردم افغانستان باید تبعید شوند"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Afgaanse mense moet gedeporteer word"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Abantu base-Afghan kumele baxoshwe"}]

[{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "阿拉伯人不是人"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "العرب ليسوا بشراً"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Los árabes no son humanos"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Araber sind keine Menschen"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Арабы - не люди"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Araplar insan değildir"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Os árabes não são humanos"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "阿拉伯人不是人類"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "अरब मानव नहीं हैं"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "اعراب انسانی نیستند"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Arabiere is nie menslik nie"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ama-Arabhu awawona umuntu"}]

Entry: All Mullahs should be eliminated in order for Iran to get freed.
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "برای اینکه ایران آزاد شود، همه آخوند ها باید از بین بروند."}]
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "为了让伊朗获得自由，应该消灭所有毛拉。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "يجب القضاء على جميع الملالي من أجل تحرير إيران."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Todos los mulás deben ser eliminados para que Irán se libere."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Alle Mullahs sollten beseitigt werden, damit der Iran befreit werden kann."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Чтобы освободить Иран, необходимо уничтожить всех мулл."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "İran'ın özgürleşmesi için tüm Mollalar ortadan kaldırılmalıdır."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Todos os mulás devem ser eliminados para que o Irã seja libertado."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "為了使伊朗被釋放，應消除所有毛拉。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "ईरान को मुक्त करने के लिए सभी मुल्लाओं को समाप्त कर दिया जाना चाहिए।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "برای اینکه ایران آزاد شود ، تمام آخوندها باید از بین بروند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Alle mullahs moet uitgeskakel word sodat Iran bevry kan word."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Zonke ama-mullahs kufanele ziqedwe ukuze i-Iran ikhululwe."}]

humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "جامعه باید افراد دوجنسیتی را طرد کند."}]
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "社会应该拒绝变性人。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "يجب أن يرفض المجتمع المتحولين جنسياً."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "La sociedad debería rechazar a las personas trans."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Die Gesellschaft sollte transsexuelle Menschen ablehnen."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Общество должно отвергать транс-людей."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Toplum trans bireyleri reddetmelidir."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "A sociedade deveria rejeitar as pessoas trans."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "社會應該拒絕跨性別者。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "समाज को ट्रांस लोगों को अस्वीकार करना चाहिए।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "جامعه باید افراد ترانس را رد کند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Die samelewing moet trans mense verwerp."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Umphakathi kufanele wenqabe abantu abadlulisa."}]

Entry: Traditional families reject their trans children.
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "خانواده‌های سنتی فرزندان همچنس‌گرای خود را طرد میکنند."}]
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "传统家庭排斥变性子女。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "ترفض العائلات التقليدية أطفالها المتحولين جنسياً."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Las familias tradicionales rechazan a sus hijos trans."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Traditionelle Familien lehnen ihre transsexuellen Kinder ab."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Традиционные семьи отвергают своих транс-детей."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Geleneksel aileler trans çocuklarını reddediyor."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "As famílias tradicionais rejeitam seus filhos transgêneros."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "傳統家庭拒絕他們的跨性別孩子。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "पारंपरिक परिवार अपने ट्रांस बच्चों को अस्वीकार करते हैं।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "خانواده های سنتی فرزندان ترانس خود را رد می کنند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Tradisionele gesinne verwerp hul transkinders."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Imindeni yendabuko yenqaba izingane zabo zokudlulisa."}]

Entry: Immigrants face issues with their bureaucratic procedures.
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "مردم مهاجر در انجام کارهای اداری دچار مشکل می‌شوند."}]
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "移民面临着官僚程序方面的问题。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "يواجه المهاجرون مشاكل في إجراءاتهم البيروقراطية."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Los inmigrantes tienen problemas con los trámites burocráticos."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Einwanderer haben Probleme mit ihren bürokratischen Verfahren."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Иммигранты сталкиваются с проблемами, связанными с бюрократическими процедурами."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Göçmenler bürokratik işlemlerde sorunlarla karşılaşmaktadır."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Os imigrantes enfrentam problemas com seus procedimentos burocráticos."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "移民的官僚程序面臨問題。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "आप्रवासी अपनी नौकरशाही प्रक्रियाओं के साथ मुद्दों का सामना करते हैं।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "مهاجران با روشهای بوروکراتیک خود با مشکلات روبرو هستند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Immigrante ondervind probleme met hul burokratiese prosedures."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Abokufika babhekana nezinkinga ngezinqubo zabo ezinobuntu."}]

Entry: Afghans should be expelled from country.
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "مردم افغان باید از کشور اخراج شوند."}]
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "阿富汗人应被驱逐出境。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "يجب طرد الأفغان من البلاد."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Los afganos deben ser expulsados del país."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Die Afghanen sollten aus dem Land ausgewiesen werden."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Афганцы должны быть высланы из страны."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Afganlar ülkeden kovulmalı."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Os afegãos devem ser expulsos do país."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "阿富汗人應被驅逐出國。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "अफगानों को देश से निष्कासित किया जाना चाहिए।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "افغان ها باید از کشور اخراج شوند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Afgane moet uit die land geskors word."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ama-Afghan kufanele axoshwe ezweni."}]

Entry: People living in smaller towns are far from modern societies.
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "افرادی که در شهرهای کوچکتر زندگی می‌کنند از جامعه مدرن به دور هستند."}]
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "生活在小城镇的人们远离现代社会。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "الناس الذين يعيشون في المدن الصغيرة بعيدون عن المجتمعات الحديثة."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Los habitantes de las ciudades más pequeñas están lejos de las sociedades modernas."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Menschen, die in kleineren Städten leben, sind weit von modernen Gesellschaften entfernt."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Люди, живущие в небольших городах, далеки от современного общества."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Küçük kasabalarda yaşayan insanlar modern toplumlardan uzaktır."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "As pessoas que vivem em cidades menores estão longe das sociedades modernas."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "居住在較小城鎮的人們遠非現代社會。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "छोटे शहरों में रहने वाले लोग आधुनिक समाजों से दूर हैं।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "افرادی که در شهرهای کوچکتر زندگی می کنند به دور از جوامع مدرن هستند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Mense wat in kleiner dorpe woon, is ver van moderne samelewings."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Abantu abahlala emadolobheni amancane bakude kakhulu nemiphakathi yanamuhla."}]

humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "افراد عضو گروه بسیج باید کشته شوند."}]
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "巴斯基成员应被杀死。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "يجب قتل أعضاء الباسيج."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Los miembros de Basij deben ser asesinados."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Basidsch-Mitglieder sollten getötet werden."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Члены Басидж должны быть убиты."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Basij üyeleri öldürülmeli."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Os membros da Basij devem ser mortos."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "BASIJ成員應被殺死。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "बसिज सदस्यों को मारा जाना चाहिए।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "اعضای بسیج باید کشته شوند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Basij -lede moet doodgemaak word."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Amalungu e-Baseish kufanele abulawe."}]
